hi,

I've been using JUnit for a while though just on my java business classes.
I'm just moving from writing servlets to using the Apache Struts framework
along with JSP.

I know that there are some utilities for testing servlets (HTTPUnit?) but
what are you people out there using for JSP & Struts.

thanks

James
subject: Testing JSP & Struts
